channel.title: Did you ever try socks are marketing material?
channel.description:
I discovered [Sockrates](https://sockratescustom.com/) a few weeks ago, it looks like a fun way to send a gift to your customers or in a tradeshow. They seems to work with big companies like Dell.
Did you tried this kind of gift already? I'm curious of the "ROI" of it
